Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors

Interface MotorIO

All Known Implementing Classes:
FalconMotor, KrakenMotor, Neo550Motor, NeoMotor, VortexMotor
public interface MotorIO
The MotorIO interface defines the methods and data structures for interacting with motor input and output operations. It provides default implementations for basic motor functionalities, enabling easier integration with various motor types.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    MotorIO.MotorIOInputs
    Represents the inputs for the motor sensor.

    • updateInputs

      default void updateInputs(MotorIO.MotorIOInputs inputs)
      Updates the motor inputs based on external sources.
      Parameters:
      inputs - The MotorIOInputs object to update with the latest sensor data.

      default double getTimeDiff()
      Retrieves the time difference used for calculations.
      Returns:
      The time difference in seconds.

    • getPosition

      default edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation2d getPosition()
      Retrieves the current position of the motor.
      Returns:
      The motor's position as a Rotation2d object.

    • getVelocity

      default double getVelocity()
      Retrieves the current velocity of the motor.
      Returns:
      The motor's velocity in meters per second.

    • setSpeed

      default void setSpeed(double speedInMPS, boolean isOpenLoop)
      Sets the motor speed.
      Parameters:
      speedInMPS - The desired speed in meters per second.
      isOpenLoop - Whether the control is open-loop.

    • setSpeed

      default void setSpeed(double speedInMPS, double mechanismCircumference, boolean isOpenLoop)
      Sets the motor speed with additional parameters.
      Parameters:
      speedInMPS - The desired speed in meters per second.
      mechanismCircumference - The circumference of the mechanism connected to the motor.
      isOpenLoop - Whether the control is open-loop.

    • setAngle

      default void setAngle(double angleInRotations)
      Sets the motor angle in rotations.
      Parameters:
      angleInRotations - The desired angle in rotations.

    • setControl

      default void setControl(double volts)
      Sets the motor control voltage.
      Parameters:
      volts - The voltage to apply to the motor.

    • stopMotor

      default void stopMotor()
      Stops the motor.
